description: Thank you very much, developer, for this great snap. Although it needs better optimization.

I thought finally an open source alternative to Obsidian. But unfortunately Logseq is very slow and hangs again and again. From the range of functions to Obsidian simply too far behind! The developers should rather concentrate on stability and speed. And that you can synchronize 100% between mobile app and desktop as in Obsidian. What good is the mobile app if the plugins don't work there. I stay with Obsidian, because everything runs stable and fast. Too bad actually.
Mein Chef hast es mir empfohlen
